DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study compare efficacy Symbicort SMART ( Symbicort Turbuhaler 160/4.5μg , one inhalation twice daily plus need ) Symbicort Turbuhaler 160/4.5μg , one inhalation twice daily plus terbutaline Turbuhaler 0.4 mg need , asthma therapy
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis asthma accord Global Initiative Asthma guideline ( GINA ) 2007 documented history least 6 month duration . Reversible airway obstruction , define increase FEV1 ≥12 % relative baseline patient 1530 minute inhalation total 2 x 0.4 mg terbutaline Turbuhaler Prescribed use inhale glucocorticoid steroid ( GCS ) ( brand ) least 12 week . Respiratory infection affect asthma , judge investigator , within 4 week . Intake oral , rectal parenteral GCS within 4 week and/or depot parenteral GCS within 12 week .
